name: CreateVendorPayment
description:
Create and apply a payment to a vendor's bill.

This tool is used to record a payment made to a vendor, with the option to apply the payment either partially or fully to the vendor's outstanding bills.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization to which the vendor payment belongs.

parameters.name: payment_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details about the vendor payment, including vendor ID, bills to apply the payment to, total amount, payment date, and other relevant payment information.

vendor_id.description: ID of the vendor associated with the Vendor Payment.

bill_id.description: ID of the bill the payment is to be applied.

tax_amount_withheld.description: Tax Amount Withheld during Bill Payment

bills.description: Individual bill payment details as array.

paid_through_account_id.description: ID of the cash/ bank account from which the payment is made.

description.description: Description for the Vendor Payment recorded.

reference_number.description: Reference number for the Vendor Payment recorded.

is_paid_via_print_check.description: Check if the Bill Payment is paid Via Print Check Option

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

bill_id.description: ID of the bill the payment is to be applied.

tax_amount_withheld.description: Tax Amount Withheld during Bill Payment

reference_number.description: Reference number for the Vendor Payment recorded.

is_paid_via_print_check.description: Check if the Bill Payment is paid Via Print Check Option

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
